summary: A documentary focusing on why one of America's oldest games has had a renaissance in the past few years and why, for so many, poker is the way to chase the American Dream.
cast: Karen Abbott|Peter Alson|Nick Brancato|Humberto Brenes|Avery Cardoza|Mike Caro|T.J. Cloutier|Alfonse D'amato|John Dahl|Nolan Dalla|Matt Damon|Frank Deford|Eric Drache|Annie Duke|Antonio Esfandiari|Mori Eskandani|Chris 'Jesus' Ferguson|Benj Gershman|Ira Glass|Jamie Gold|Doris Kearns Goodwin|Barry Greenstein|Joe Hachem|Phil Hellmuth Jr.|Ben Jaffe|Lacey Jones|George Joseph|Roger Kimball|Brian Koppelman|Phil Laak|Howard Lederer|John Leland|Steve Lipscomb|Jason Lockwood|John Marinacci|Shane Mccullough|Tom McEvoy|James McManus|Isabelle Mercier|Jon Miller|Chris Moneymaker|Marty Morgan|Eric Morris|Daniel Negreanu|Scotty Nguyen|Henry Orenstein|Jeffrey Pollack|'Amarillo Slim' Preston|Greg Raymer|Marc Roberge|Kenny Rogers|Vanessa Rousso|Michael Scelza|David G. Schwartz|Howard Schwartz|Mike Sexton|Sam Simon|David Singer|Bert Randolph Sugar|Vincent Van Patten|Des Wilson
title: All In: The Poker Movie
